amendment.description: To authorize and strengthen the tsunami detection, forecast, warning, research, and mitigation program of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 205 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 205 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 204.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 205 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 204.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 205 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
